page.title: 07Breachwood Green Motor Co.
page.content: The SAAB garage at Breachwood Green sells all sorts of SAAB cars -SAAB 90, SAAB 900,SAAB 9001,900 turbo and 900 turbo 16's.They sell between 15 and 20 cars a month.The SAAB's travel from Sweden by boat.They are loaded onto lorries and driven to Breachwood Motors. The garage opens from 8.30am. till 6pm.Mondays to Fridays and from 9am.till 1pm. on Saturdays.The company employs 25 people including 8 mechanics, 5 secretaries and 1 salesman.In a normal day, the secretary would do invoices for the cars,make tea for everyone and type all the letters.To help her, she has a typewriter,telephone, a computer and a word-processer.At Breachwood Green Motors they do M.O.T.testing where they test brakes,lights,tyres and steering.
